actor_awards.notes: A Cuban-American musician, actor, and television producer who revolutionized the television industry. He co-founded Desilu Productions with his wife Lucille Ball. He is credited with pioneering the multi-camera setup for sitcoms. He received two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (Motion Picture and Television).

filmography.title: The Long, Long Trailer
filmography.role_description: A newlywed husband who reluctantly agrees to buy a massive trailer home for his honeymoon trip, leading to disaster.
filmography.plot: A newlywed couple buys a large travel trailer to live in as they travel across the United States for their honeymoon, leading to disastrous comedic situations.

filmography.title: Forever, Darling
filmography.role_description: A scientist whose marriage is failing until his wife's guardian angel intervenes during a field trip.
filmography.plot: A scientist's wife goes on a field trip with him to save their marriage, aided by her guardian angel.

filmography.title: I Love Lucy
filmography.role_description: The Cuban bandleader and husband to the wacky Lucy, trying to make it in show business while managing his chaotic home life.
filmography.plot: A feature-length compilation of three episodes from the famous sitcom, edited together for a theatrical release.

filmography.title: Bataan
filmography.role_description: A spirited soldier and jitterbug dancer who fights alongside a doomed patrol in the Philippines.
filmography.plot: A small group of American soldiers defend a bridge on the Bataan peninsula against the Japanese army during World War II.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Too Many Girls
filmography.role_description: A college football star and bodyguard tasked with protecting a wealthy heiress. Arnaz met Lucille Ball on the set of this film.
filmography.plot: A rich girl wants to go to college without bodyguards, so her father hires four football players to protect her secretly.

filmography.title: Four Jacks and a Jill
filmography.role_description: A taxi-driving band member who claims to be a banished king to impress a girl.
filmography.plot: Four musicians and a singer get involved with gangsters and a woman posing as a queen.

filmography.title: The Navy Comes Through
filmography.role_description: A loyal sailor and gunner serving on a merchant ship during the war.
filmography.plot: The crew of a Merchant Marine ship battles German U-boats and planes in the North Atlantic.

filmography.title: Father Takes a Wife
filmography.role_description: A Latin American singer who becomes a stowaway and complicates a shipping magnate's honeymoon.
filmography.plot: A shipping magnate and a famous actress marry, but their honeymoon is interrupted by a stowaway singer.

filmography.title: Cuban Pete
filmography.role_description: A Cuban bandleader who is lured to New York by a talent scout.
filmography.plot: A television talent scout travels to Cuba to find a new star and discovers a bandleader, but has trouble convincing him to leave.

filmography.title: Holiday in Havana
filmography.role_description: A Cuban hotel busboy and aspiring composer who dreams of a musical career.
filmography.plot: A busboy at a Havana hotel falls in love with a dancer and tries to get his songs published.

filmography.title: The Escape Artist
filmography.role_description: A corrupt politician involved in the dark underbelly of a city. Arnaz's final film role.
filmography.plot: A young teen prodigy, the son of a late escape artist, attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death while dealing with corrupt officials.
